column4: i used ssh to connect to comp#2 and then tried to use it to connect to comp#3 (which now had the same ip as comp#2) and ssh spit out an error saying it dint trust the new computer and it wouldnt connect how do i fix that and avoid it in the future ?

i used ssh to connect to comp#2 and then tried to use it to connect to comp#3 (which now had the same ip as comp#2) and ssh spit out an error saying it dint trust the new computer and it wouldnt connect how do i fix that and avoid it in the future ?
and to avoid it in the future ?
might sound bad but you can't really .... unless you disable the protection entirely, which can be done in /etc/sshd/sshd.conf iirc ...
